General.Name: Puya Semiconductor Shanghai Co Ltd
General.Description: Puya Semiconductor (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. engages in design and sale of non-volatile memory chips and derivative chips based on memory chips in China and internationally. Its products include Flash, Eeprom, MCU, Analog, Known good die, and Wafer level chip scale package. The company serves automotive, industrial, communications, mobile, consumer, and IoT fields. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
